content:
While working on this issue, I realized an edge case where if the email is too long, it wraps to the next line, leaving almost a line at the top. There could be an alternative to this where we break words if they do not fit in one line. This would make the content inside the notice take up much less space and seem clearer. Would appreciate any feedback.

  • Without word-break:
    Screenshot-from-2023-03-07-01-58-01.png

  • With word-break:
    Screenshot-from-2023-03-07-01-58-14.png
The break in "confirm" in the second screenshot is not good.
The first one seems OK to me. It's an edge case, so I'm not too worried about it as long as it doesn't look broken.
Sounds good, will push the latest changes.
